description: Returns the most recent status of the last upgrade or upgrade eligibility check performed on an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain of the domain to get upgrade status information for.

nested_items.name: UpgradeStep
nested_items.description: One of three steps that an upgrade or upgrade eligibility check goes through.

nested_items.name: StepStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the current step that an upgrade is on.

nested_items.name: UpgradeName
nested_items.description: A string that describes the update.
